nodes.text: The ebon hawk was a species of hawk. A carnivorous bird, they hunted creatures such as the skittermouse, a rodent found on the desert planet Jakku. Resistance operative Vi Moradi compared the residents of the planet Batuu naively believing that they were safe from the First Order to a skittermouse that was being preyed on by an ebon hawk.

The ebon hawk was first mentioned in Galaxy's Edge: Black Spire, a novel written by Delilah S. Dawson and published in 2019. The bird species shares its name with a starship from the Legends continuity that belonged to Revan, among others.
